CustomObject.description: The application level flags that can be used to switch on/off certain behaviors or capabilities in the application like a WOWO. This can be used to turn on/off new sub flows, features, service calls or anything else that we can think of from the application side. If we want to control certain system / technical behaviors like turning off prefetch/async, query and so on, please refer the System_Flag custom metadata.
CustomObject.label: Application Flag
